attributes.action: Reject censorship & allow all petitions on this website
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: All petitions should be allowed & not just those that are "approved". This smacks of the sort of censorship that shoudnt be accepted in a democracy.

rejection.details:
If we approved every petition we'd end up with dozens on each subject, which would reduce the impact of the service

People also petition the PM to change things over which he has no control

All rejected petitions are displayed on the website - only those which are defamatory, or contain offensive language - are surpressed

http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/list/rejected
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
